thread.title: OPM offers three years coverage to breach victims
thread.title_full: OPM offers three years coverage to breach victims

title: OPM offers three years coverage to breach victims
text:
02 OPM offers three years coverage to breach victims 
Federal Times: The Office of Personnel Management had awarded a contract to Identity Theft Guard Solutions to provide identity and credit protection services to federal employees in the wake of this summer's massive network hack, according to acting director Beth Cobert. She announced the award during a conference call with reporters on Sept. 1. The company is better known as ID Experts.
